name: Visit The Unbuild
description:
This is an educational application based on the @postasis European project and the collaboration of Paris 8, for the development of the plug-in Behaviour Interactive Interface (BII) for virtual actors. 

The user can  set direction (random, forward, on map) to the actors, as well as functions (spawn, destroy, follow, increase, etc). Moreover, in BII the user can change in different views, Top, Axonometric, First Person Controller and Observer. 

The environment is designed by the students of Architecture at National Technical University of Athens, during the course of Architectural Design 9, 2018/19. 

You can find a manual of BII at www.apostasis.eu.
